website_summaries.verdict: If corners are a primary concern, this multipack of clear guards provides inconspicuous protection from nasty knocks.
pros: Clear construction blends well in any setting
Soft and thick for optimal protection
Universal fit works with all right angle corners
Large enough to not pose a choking risk
Generous pack of 20 takes care of most household corners
cons: Only covers corners, leaving edges exposed

customer_reviews.title: For clumsy kids
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and probably should have gotten it a lot sooner. I have a very clumsy 2 year old and she always ends up landing wrong. I haven’t had issues since. At first they can come off easy so keeps the tikes away for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Applied per instructions, with a few days the glue started coming off or expanding or what have you. Plus we have cats so hair is sticking to the adhesive and it’s gross. And to add these are not child proof, i took them off before my toddler noticed they were loose, however, these are a choking hazard. If the adhesive were to be of better quality I would rate 5 stars, but the fact the are not durable and do not last but a couple days I would say it’s a waste of money. In fact I’m going to see if can return them.
customer_reviews.author: Luis & Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product if you have babies
customer_reviews.text: Parents, please avoid this product. We originally got it for our kids but it turned out to be a nightmare. 1. The adhesive gel isn’t very strong. My 1 year old was able to rip it out from the table, separating the adhesive from the protector. My kid would then peel the adhesive from the table and try to eat it. This is a choking hazard. Be warned!! 2. The corner piece itself is a choking hazard. My 1 year ripped out the protector and actually choked on it. Good thing we were close by and was able to remove. Parents please avoid this product if you have babies!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dao C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby proofing item. You get 20 in the box which is an awesome value. The adhesion sticks really well, my daughter is not gonna be able to get these suckers off. But the adhesion is a sort of gel which seems like it’ll be reusable. They’re smaller than I expected. I guess I sort of assumed it’d be more obvious that they’re there, but they’re really quite unobtrusive. If you walk into a corner with one of these bad boys on it’s going to hurt a heck of a lot less. Overall, I’d give this item a 10/10. I’ll buy more if I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone who loves their children and home!
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids get these!!! They have saved use from several bumps to the head while learning to walk. I think its a necessity to avoid scars/bumps but I also take pride in my home being pretty so getting the brown or white foam bumpers was just not an option for us. These are still noticeable but its not the first thing you see and they blend so much better than other products out there. The adhesive is strong too, our kid has tried to yank at them but being adhered from every side keeps it strong. They do come off without residue too, I have had to remove and re-position some a few times with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, shady reviews
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked this product. It is very thick and sticks well, even to my slate hearth. However, my packaging came with an ad for their brand, Ella's Homes review "club", and it promises free stuff for reviews. This is why I am growing sour on Amazon; it is harder to find quality products then ever. This is the only reason for the 3 stars; unethical practices.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Good product but read installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: So I’m going to edit my previous review of 1 star, after posting it the company sent me a brand new box, without being asked. The new box with instructions. I installed them correctly and got a stronger bond with the corners. So I may have had a bad batch or more likely just installed them wrong but these new ones are a great product
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Literally Saved My Life!
customer_reviews.text: I redecorated to distract from the loss of my only daughter to a super-drunk driver. I'm 63 and finally bought the mirrored bedroom furniture I had always wanted. TWICE I have fallen out of bed and injured myself from the sharp mirrored corner of my bedside table. (1st fall actually broke the table so I ordered a replacement.) After the second fall, my friends were going to insist I lose the table. SO.........Ella's Home is saving me from fall #3 damage AND I get to keep the luxe look of the room. Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzysez

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to keep my grandsons save. I have both a three year old and a one year old. The one year old is just starting to walk so I was concerned about the corners of our furniture causing damage to him (as you know when they start walking they are not real steady). I also found some of the higher corners were also dangerous to the three year old (they fall also sometimes). This product was easy to install and looks to be durable enough to last until they get older (and steadier). Thanks you for offering this product for sale.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended A+++
customer_reviews.text: This is very helpful. It can be attach to any size edge of table. The adhesive works great. I have a 1yr old active baby so this really helped me protect my little one. Thank you. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I've tried alot of corner protectors and these have been the best. Between my dogs chewing, my toddler being able to tear it off, or simply not protecting, I've had a hard time finding ones that work. There are the best! They are already to go. You just peel the seal off the sticky and put on corners.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Fairy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Clear corner covers
customer_reviews.text: These covers are super easy to put on the corners of coffee tables, side tables, and any other furniture that the corners come to a point. I like that it’s clear so that it is almost not noticeable but it does put emphasis on any flaws underneath the corner cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corner guards easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My parents watch my niece of 3 years old. As we know they run and next thing you know they hit a corner edge from the coffee table. These have proved to be an accident saver.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT - CHOKING HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: The stickiness of the pieces suck. They won’t stay on at all and the ones that do stay on are easily removed. Even though they refuse to stick it did manage to stick only to the paint on my $1500 entertainment cabinet. (See picture) the WORST part was that my crawling 7 month old was able to pull of the piece and put the entire thing in his mouth. Luckily I was near by and heard him gagging and was able to take it out. Save yourself the hassle and spend the extra money to get a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Will order again!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on Sunday night and they arrived by Tuesday so the shipping time was incredible to start! I needed something for the corners of a chest that sits slightly behind a door and was looking for something to prevent the door from getting damaged by hitting the chest. When I saw them on a Facebook post I thought they would be perfect, and they are! Not only are they super sticky and fit exactly where I need them too, they don’t take away from the look of the piece I needed them for!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No good. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The product works in theory, but it is shaped in a way that allows it to only fit on specific types of locations, and not all homes have the perfect shape spot. The product smells of chemicals. The glue tore the finish as well as paint off my furniture without removing it, just from it settling and popping up. Terrible product. Now I have damaged surfaces. Also, very dangerous product. Easily removed by a toddler and headed for her mouth. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Awaits

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: They serve the purpose of protecting the baby but if the corner is within reach, kids can peel these off. My baby got one off and popped it in her mouth! They are clear, so it was not easily noticeable. In my opinion, the corner protectors should be colorful - not clear.
customer_reviews.author: Arroyo Family

customer_reviews.title: Do not stick, 1 year old kids removed immediately, choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my one year old kept running in to the edge of my tv stand and a desk. I prepped each surface well (one surface is real wood, the other finished particle board. Unfortunately, in both cases my daughter was able to easily remove them as soon as she noticed them AND they are a choking hazard. I tried replacing them and she removed those easily, as well. While they’re great in theory, the adhesive doesn’t work well enough and because they stick out it’s too easy for little hands to grab and remove. Now I’m stuck with a huge pack and they’re unusable.
customer_reviews.author: SaraSoda

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: We liked these corner guards because they work well and they look nice. This is the second time that we had ordered these. The adhesive papers were a little hard to pull off, but if you know that you won’t pull off the adhesiveness then they aren’t that hard. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, did the job
customer_reviews.text: My sister was visiting our condo with her son, and we needed a quick, easy and effective means to childproof all the sharp corners on our furniture. These corner guards were easy to install, did not detract from the look of our modern furniture, and should be easy to remove in a week. As other reviewers have pointed out, they do come off if the child actively pulls at them, but that is understandable. If they were too strong, then they would peel off the paint when you want to eventually remove them
customer_reviews.author: Suvir Bhatia

customer_reviews.title: Baby can remove from corners
customer_reviews.text: Overall these work as advertised. They stick to corners seemingly well and are relatively unobtrusive. They're not as invisible as some reviews would make you think, but they're not a huge eyesore. However, my 9 month old chews on everything, as babies do, and since these are on the coffee table corners right around her height she started chewing on them. So far she's been able to pull two off the table, which makes me believe the adhesive isn't great. They're also the perfect size to choke an infant. Will be removing them and trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Decimated by a 9 month old
customer_reviews.text: These are a hit or miss in terms of if they stay in place. About 50% pop off spontaneously. However, what is more concerning is that my 9 month old has systematically dislodged pretty much each and every one that she can reach - she then proceeds to try and put it in her mouth. These do not serve their intended purpose. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sinha

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for these corner protectors, but they sadly didn't work out for us. We have a 9 month old and he is learning to walk on his own now. He cruises along our side tables, entertainment center, and coffee table frequently. We put these on so if he were to fall or bump his head near the corners it would prevent serious injury. They were very easy to install but after only a few months of having them onthey are coming up. The ones on our glass entertainment center came off first. Now they're a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Roomba doesn't get stuck under table corners
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these not for having young ones in the house, but the Roomba getting stuck under the corners of the coffee table. These worked out perfect! The Roomba doesn't get stuck on the corners of the table any longer. At first, I used only one side of the adhesive, but them later learned that the strength the Roomba can pull it off. So I used 2 sides of the adhesive. Although, it looks a little distracting for a home that doesn't have young ones potentially hitting the corners of the tables, it works perfect for the intent I purchased them for.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Stay safe
customer_reviews.text: Ranked 4 as I have had a few not stay adhesive long. Otherwise, does what I’m looking for and keeping toddler from hurting self on corners.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Munden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Corner Guards!
customer_reviews.text: Having a 10 month old child that is constantly on the move, having his noggin protected from sharp corners is important. Seeing all the ratings on this product, we decided to give it a shot. They are extremely easy to apply and use, but the longevity of the adhesive on a clean, smooth, wooden corner left a little to be desired. It was able to be removed by my kid, although it took some effort on his part. The manufacturer has stated they went to a stronger adhesive, and I will update my review after trying out the improved version.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Laarkamp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased these corner guards for my coffee table but due to the tiered design of the table edges, they did not fit well...HOWEVER...I have used them in other places around my home, including the sharp corners on my hardwood stairs and they work quite well. Overall, I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good but dont really stand up to heat
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are priced good but expect them to fall off if they experience any heat. I put some in the garage for my own head's sake and they didn't last long as the heat i guess melts the glue. The ones in my house lasted a lot longer, but also had glue failure after a while. Due to 100 degree Houston summer days we leave the AC on 80ish while were gone. No worried though because these are cheap and sold in bulk so just slap another one on!
customer_reviews.author: Sleazy E

customer_reviews.title: not Meant for a bumper to protect children.  Meant to protect furniture
customer_reviews.text: If your child were to fall and hit one of these bumpers straight on they may not get as hurt as if there were nothing there but they will still get hurt. These are very dense hard plastic covers. Fall on one and you get a serious bruise. They are good for protecting furniture corners from damage or for example during a move. But definitely not useful to protect your children. I am going back to the foam adhesive corner covers which actually prevent injury
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sir Master Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, sticks decently well and covers the corners!! Does it’s job well
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Leave Residue
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these table corners over the foam table corners. They aren't as soft as the foam corners, but they do the job and look better. Also, they did not leave a residue when removed.
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Quite bad...baby can take it out in a second
customer_reviews.text: Quite bad in terms of adhesion and is of no use. My one year old can pick from any surface including glass or wood corners. It looks like it's sticking but the adhesive between protector and surface is super low quality. Also a choking hazard once removed. Quite some folks mentioned this in their reviews and I experienced the same. Not worth buying and trying to paste. Update : received replacement which is far better than original packet. Also there is a visible difference in items and quality. See the pic. The bottom one is replacement while top one is original order.
customer_reviews.author: Shailendra Singh

customer_reviews.title: The package has come on time and I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: The package has come on time and I like it very much. One piece has been tested after 10mins stick to the dining table's corner by my daughter (by chance). I was afraid it would be splitted by her force but it remained calmly that way when I sticked it. Good looking product, it doesn't show some ridiculous colors than many others. So far I love it. Updated: I took 2 stars off. My 11month baby could peel it off from 1 corner already. I will need other products soon.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Get these!!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old is running around like crazy now and with so many sharp edges all around the house, particularly on the kitchen island and restroom cabinets, decided to get these. I absolutely love that they are clear not taking away from the furniture you place them on. They are super ready to install— literally just peel the paper off sticker and push in. Have only had these up for 3 days so I can’t speak to hope long they will hold up for bit so far, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and nice looking but not adhering strongly enough
customer_reviews.text: I liked these when I ordered them and installed them (which was totally painless) but my 9 month old has managed to pull off 3 of these already. Luckily a bit too large for him to swallow... but full disclosure in the company's defense, I didnt use rubbing alcohol or clean the surfaces before adhering and not all the surfaces were smooth (2 examples where these fell off: corner of a window sill- painted but bumpy, corner of the stainless steel dishwasher- smooth). Other spots seem more secure so certainly not a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Tiakristi

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: Liked the corner guards so much I got a second set. For some reason the second set didn’t work out as well, but the company immediately made things right, sending me replacements lightening fast. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alisa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WANT TO WRITE THIS, GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: These are corner protectors for babies, they work great. Why can't I just submit stars for certain reviews!?! I did NOT want to write anything, I just wanted to submit 5 STARS... DONE! I'm trying to be good and support your clients, why don't you give the option of what you have to fill out!!! THIS IS CRAZY!! Only stars should be allowed as an option!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy C.

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely work!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I put them on every corner in our home. I actually bought more because they are so great! Our sweet granddaughter stays with us 4 days a week and we have a wooden litter box cover. She tripped and fell into the box and while she did get a small red mark on her face, I cannot imagine what would have happened without your product. I can’t say enough good things about your product, except maybe you should branch out into other areas! I put them on rocking chair ends to protect the walls. Sometimes there is a little modification, but they are great. Just had to share!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Longdon

customer_reviews.title: Protector fell off; son now stuck to residual tape.
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to set up on furniture but over time all of the corner protectors fell off. They come with adhesive strips that are supposed to hold the protectors in place. The protectors all eventually fell off and the adhesive strips remained, making all of our furniture corners sticky, and the strips are very difficult to remove. As a result, all of our furniture is now sticky on the corners. Not only does this product fail in mitigating corner danger, but if our child fell into a corner, he would get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for tv table corners
customer_reviews.text: I used it to baby proof the tv table in my living area and my 1 year old baby took it off with ease! I made sure it was stuck properly!! We made sure it stuck properly and rechecked it so that it would bot come out... but my baby woke up... saw the bumpers and worked on it for like 5-10 minutes and there it is in his hands !!! 🤣 i feel adhesion should much more stronger and the bumpers should have more depth So that they can be fixed on the corners and are harder to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Shivermetimbers

customer_reviews.title: Easy for babies to pull off
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these do not stay on . I followed instructions & most of them have come off . Including 2 from my 8 month old who then tried to put it in her mouth ! They’re the perfect size for choking . The sticky tape that clings to them does not ruin your furniture though so that’s awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Hideous, but they work
customer_reviews.text: These work fairly well- they’re still pretty firm so if you bruise easily you’re still likely to get a bruise from bumping into them, but at least not as bad a bruise as with a corner. They attach firmly, but will likely damage surfaces/finish to remove. They’re hideously unsightly when attached, though. I wish they came in black and other furniture colors so they’d be less noticeable. The clear is super shiny and very obvious and eye catching. Not desirable. But, they do work.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great For Use On My Metal BBQ
customer_reviews.text: These soft jelly-like corner protectors are fantastic! I used mine for perhaps a somewhat unusual purpose. I placed then on the sharp square corners of my outdoor barbecue so that these sharp corners would not wear through my BBQ cover. My brother-in-law was so impressed with this idea, I mounted some on his BBQ too. Really helps to keep from wearing holes through the cover on those sharp corners., and hardly noticeable when using the BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Roadbuilder55

customer_reviews.title: Good size and feel / terrible adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and feel of them however the adhesive didn’t last at all. They just started sliding off and eventually left the adhesive goo on the corners and the buttons were on the floor. I needed up adding some 3M double sided tape to the 3 surfaces and stuck them back on. I bought these back in feb 2019. They were originally called ellas home. I see they changed the name now. Maybe updated product? Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Habib

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: after the review, the customer service contacted me, they said that I probably got a defective product and send me Skyla Homes - Clear Corner Protectors and Skyla Homes - L-Shape Clear Corner Protectors. I have to say that the experience with these ones was totally different, we put them on the furniture and Even though my baby tried to remove them they are well attached.. These corner guards look well and are easy to install, but the adhesive don't work.. My 9 months baby without any effort could remove it. What a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that the tjis product was pre glued and all i had to do was peel the tape. Made installing super easy. My son has bee picking at these for a week and hasn't been able to pull them off yet. That's a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago, before my twins were even crawling, and put them on the corners of all of our furniture. I actually really like the way they look- they’re very unobtrusive- and they went on in seconds, but two have already fallen off, so clearly the adhesive isn’t quite as strong as it needs to be, and now I’m slightly concerned about them becoming a choking hazard. If they stayed in place they’d be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Son's Noggin!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly easy to use, and they don't look too terrible when they're installed. My son already gave them a test run with his forehead... thank goodness I had these. They stick very well, and are soft enough to do the job. The only unknown for me is whether the adhesive will hurt the wood on our tables, etc. - but in the end, I'm more concerned about safety, and these do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo

customer_reviews.title: These work like a charm and stay put
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm and stay put. Provide good cushion and you get many pieces for a cheap price. My only concern is they are a bit on the small side and I would hesitate and be cautious if you have a toddler under 2 years old old.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for small children
customer_reviews.text: I put these up all over to protect my kiddos from bumping their heads on sharp corners only to discover them in the hands of both my 6 month olds! They are very easy to pull off and appealing to infants as a chew toy (so dangerous!!!!!!). The concept was great, but they are just too dangerous to have around children who put everything in your mouths.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great child proof product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Much easier to stick to corners of any tables. I bought a bigger ones before and those didn't work so well. They kept coming off. So I bought these and they stick onto the table pretty solid. Hasn't fallen off once since I installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, but my 20 month old...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but my 20 month old easily ripped off the balls, and now I have to worry about a choking hazard. Not great. I really wanted to like this product, but...cannot give it more than a star due to the fact that I now have to remove and replace them with something better. Waste of time, effort and money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install fast child proof option.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to instantly childproof corners. We used these on our entertainment center, bookshelves, dining room table, dressers and anywhere there was a sharp 90 degree angle near our toddler. Very easy to install and they seem durable. Took a few minutes to go through the house and peel and stock these. They are a lot thicker than flimsy foam corner bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna DiGi

customer_reviews.title: Easily ripped of by toddler. Becomes choking hazard.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product- looks good and easy to use. However, they don’t stay on. He constantly takes them off and puts the entire thing in his mouth. I can’t use them because I’m scared he’s going to choke. Even though they say it’s not a choking hazard I can’t watch my one year old with the entire thing in his mouth and believe that.
customer_reviews.author: malia

customer_reviews.title: Pulled off by 9 month old, don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time or money on these. I had these installed for 4 days on my coffee table, on day 4 my 9 month old daughter noticed them and proceeded to take one off the coffee table. They may not be small enough to be a choking hazard, but the last thing I want is for her to be eating the adhesive residue. Clearly the adhesive is not strong enough if a 9 month old is able to pull them off.
customer_reviews.author: Steve V

customer_reviews.title: Came off easier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was great at first but my daughter easily ripped both off the corners of our table and put them in her mouth. They quickly became much more dangerous to have around than the edge of the table. The item itself is nice quality, they just need to work out the adhesive. It doesn’t seem to be durable enough to hold the safety piece in place.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Good concept.. but NOT for baby proofing. As soon as my baby became mobile they started trying to pull these off the corners. The adhesive is not that great so they were able to pull off a few and I caught them chewing on one once. Choking hazard. If you are looking for baby proofing I'd suggest something else... If you just need for yourself and don't have to worrying about kids who put everything int their mouth then these might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are clear and the adhesion is decent. Easy to install, but I felt that they worked on some corners and others not so much. My son was immediately attracted to the set we put on our entertainement center and bit at them and pulled them off. The ones on my dining table have been great. They have absolutely saved his head at least once or twice on a corner and that makes me feel like it was a decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B Daffron

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to soften the blow when our toddler runs into the corners of my kitchen island bar. It definitely helps and were simple to install. Since they are clear, they don't stand out from a distance. Of course they appear "bubbled up" as seen in the picture. But the protection from sharp corners is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Makes my home much safer
customer_reviews.text: EAsy to use and works great! The corner guards worked well on different furniture pieces and make my home safer for my active 1&1/2 year old. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: msp12r

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: I put these one my table. I have used similar product from another seller in the past which was OK. These are horrible and I had to use Gorilla Glue to get them to stay on. Without the Gorilla Glue they were absolutely useless. Fell off within an hour. I cleaned with alcohol, didn't help. I do not recommend. Try another brand/seller.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick even without toddleer pulling
customer_reviews.text: My 17-mo daughter was able to pull these off after about two weeks or so, but what's really upsetting is that one starting to come off even when the area was not accessed by my daughter yet. It just started to slip off 4-5 days later. The plastic itself is very sturdy, it's just the adhesion that's not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Kwong

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: These are affordable high quality guards that can save a lot of headaches while keeping your little ones safe. I even used them on the bottom of our stainless steel stove to prevent our son from catching the sharp corner with his toes. I highly recommend this great product from a company that cares.
customer_reviews.author: Mueller

customer_reviews.title: These are great, but....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put on the corners of my wooden table so that my 2 year old doesn't harm herself. These fit perfectly and do the job. The only problem is that my daughter is eye level to the protectors and she tried to grab them and pull them off. She has not been successful (yet). I am hoping that the adhesive on these doesn't start wearing off.
customer_reviews.author: K. E.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick to our glass console
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to receive these protectors because our 7 month old daughter is extremely curious and starting to move around more. The package arrived quickly (as expected by delivery date). The protectors are clear and very rubbery, like a gummy bear! Has round corners so its not sharp in any way. We purchased this with the hope of covering up the sharp edges on our media console which is made of glass. Unfortunately, the protectors do not stick very well to the glass. For this reason, the product is receiving less stars. Otherwise, I think its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Krageegurl79

customer_reviews.title: *** Not safe for almost 11 months old baby.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I can give this 5 stars but no... my 10.5 months old baby boy is a very active & non-stop to cruising around, 100% proofs from get hurt. And it is very easy to installed. But, with heat wave & humid... don't have AC at home... all proofs fell off by itself a few times in less than a week. :( ***Updated, my baby boy knows how to take it off from coffee table & chewing it with gel on. I freaked out because it happened way too fast & he almost eat gel. I would like to get my refund. Not worth to order this & unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: L.Q.

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the great reviews on these. They don’t stay on well at all. My 1 year old is able to easily pull them off and they are the worst shape and size possible, I imagine they would be a terrible choking hazard. They lasted a couple weeks in my house before I removed them all.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: WOW I wish we had these for our children!
customer_reviews.text: We are now Grandparents and wanted to child friendly our home for the Grandbabies. These are amazing, easy to install and have already saved the day from corners and a toddler at play! Would definitely recommend the product. And I will be purchasing more to include in ALL Baby Shower gift bags that I give to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Nana J

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I chose these for the "invisibility" of the clear material as much for the padding. Working great protecting my knees from the sharp corners of the knee well of my desk. The low cost for 20 of these means I have plenty to use and share with family that has two toddler grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: MtSiView

customer_reviews.title: do not stick as well as I would like
customer_reviews.text: very attractive, BUT put these on in March 2019, by October 2019 they were falling off. In February 2019 i had put on white foam guards. They are not at all attractive, BUT seem as solidly attached 9 months later as when they were first attached.
customer_reviews.author: happy amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: These corners are a really good idea and do save the babies head when learning to walk. My only problem is the quality of the adhesive, seems they fall off over time pretty easily and once the little one saw they come off she tries to yank them off all the time now. She doesn't seem to be able to choke on them though, which is good
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: not suited for tropics
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my table corners. The following day i found them on the floor. The glue was just very soft. It did stick on the table but not on the clear corners.
customer_reviews.author: ivan geerlings

customer_reviews.title: Work well only on perfect corners
customer_reviews.text: These work well only if you have perfectly square corners. Our coffee table is slightly larger at the bottom of the table top than the top and these just will not stay on. The adhesive seems to work well, and there isn't a bad odor to them. The instructions said to use heat to remove but I haven't had an issue getting them off and having residual adhesive left behind.
customer_reviews.author: nmac

customer_reviews.title: HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to stick on the corners of my living room table and my 8 month old was able to pull them off. They're the perfect size to choke on and I'm so glad I was in the room when I realized what had happened. Extremely disappointed :/
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to last
customer_reviews.text: My son is able to pull these off with persistence. The idea is great, but they can't stand up to my 9 month old's strength. I saw my son pull one off and pop it in his mouth, but thankfully they are too large for him to swallow. There was a little bit of sticky goo residue when I removed them from the corners, but I was able to peel it away without damaging the furniture, so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: These are not a material that is cushioned, it is a hard plastic. But the plastic is rounded. These don't make your furniture look tacky and stay on very well despite the fact that you peel and stick. I have not had any issues at all. You get a lot for the price which is great. I was able to use them all over. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! No residue!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy these while pregnant because I couldn’t see my feet - that being said, I’m thrilled I did. We use them on everything - now have a 10 month old and they’re holding strong. When she ripped one off, placed over a year ago, there was no residue on the table corner. I love these. My shins do too.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: GREAT  PROTECTORS
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 metal file cabinets next to my computer desk. I am also a fall risk and was always afraid that I would lose my balance and injure myself on the sharp corners of my file cabinets. I ordered these corner protectors when I saw them and am so glad I did! They were super easy to attach to my file cabinet corners and give a very soft,cushy protection.These protectors are clear and would be perfect to child proof sharp furniture corners. They also would be a great baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in this product. Installation is easy. I followed all the steps and even cleaned the surface. They have all been falling off and I’m finding them looking like the photo just hanging on. My little one is able to pick them off and put them in his mouth which of course made me panic and hate this product more. Don’t waste your money and protect your little one and don’t buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: They don't stick very well.
customer_reviews.text: The company shipped them fast & I would like to give them a good review....Unfortunately my toddler pulls them off & puts them in his mouth. Could be a potential choking hazard. Would work better if they stuck better so child could not pull them off so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These silicone clear adhesive pads are good for All ages.
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install and I used everyone of these corner pads. As far as age-appropriate, I have a 96-year-old mother and if she bumps the corner say in the bathroom, it could cut her skin. So I placed them from bed footboard to corners on end tables, coffee tables, bathroom counter corners etc. My house is safe for my elderly mother. I’m 58y/o/f w/a 96y/o/mom. No worries when she visits!!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They don’t stay stuck! Keep falling off. It is more of a danger than protection as you think corner is protected but NO! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: ZOeH

customer_reviews.title: Mom relieved.
customer_reviews.text: These were incredibly easy to install and they look good on my wood table. I hope my kid never falls hard enough to bonk her head, but these give me some comfort that an injury would be greatly lessened. My brother still has a small scar on his forehead from a childhood injury involving a head-vs-corner cabinet and he lost.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Choking and safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!! Do not buy these. I never write bad reviews unless it’s a safety choking hazard! My 6 month old can take them off and they are small enough he can put them in his mouth! They also have ruined all of my tables I put them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, solid but soft, if that makes any sense!! They stick on great, we've had a few really hot days - in the 90s - and I was worried they would come loose but they are holding strong! Going to buy some for grandma's house next!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: Economical and effective1 They apply easily and fit most style corners. Of course the corner protectors will change the look of any piece, but they do have a very smooth and unobtrusive style...almost like suspended water. Best thing is that they are strong and work. Furniture corners can really injure toddlers, sometimes leaving a mark you'll both remember. Don't risk it!
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: They look good and seemed great. But, as some other reviewers said, these do not stay on. My 11 month old was able to pull several of them off, and some of them came off by themselves(!!!!). A waste of money overall, though they did make a good impression.
customer_reviews.author: Prisca Lo Surdo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far really like how easy it was to install these to all my tables. Also really like that it’s round and not like other square protectors. My only issue is how they fit when trying to put one right above the other which concerns me as to how long the adhesive will last of the entire thing isn’t able to stick to the table because of overlap. Also my pack did not come with 20 as stated on the box. It came with 19 so I’m left to figure out what to get for that last corner.
customer_reviews.author: Twinventures

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and happy with them...
customer_reviews.text: I have placed these on a stainless steel wall oven sharp corner trim (not a hot area), and an antique trunk with sharp brass corners, they are staying on well. So far our 15 month old granddaughter has not tried to remove them. From afar, I do not even notice them. I am sure I will be able to find other items for placement throughout the house. I have even noticed items in my tool box that may need bounce protection.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K.

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these were great. They don’t look too awful for child proofing items. But it takes two to cover both ends of each corner. And, after a few weeks they are falling off as the adhesive has worn off. I thought it was maybe just one or two but it’s happened with several of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last less than a day. Get the good ones.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought the Corner Guards brand when I built my house as my counter has very sharp corners. They lasted about 2.5 years and a couple started to fall off. I got these as they were twice the number of guards for half the price. Big mistake. There are horrible. Fall off within a day. Spend the extra few dollars on the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: NathanSYM

customer_reviews.title: Useless choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: This product will not stand up to your pull-up crawler or curious toddler. Within a week, mine had taken 4 corners off and the glue doesn't work after being taken off. I took the rest off when I found one in his mouth. They are clear and just the right size to be a major choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: SSJ

customer_reviews.title: They protect little grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: This is our second order of Skyla Homes Corner Protectors.... They work great....we place them on all corners of our furniture though out our house so our young grandchildren don't hurt them selves banging into sharp corners or even rounded corners....they come nicely packed.... arrived on time... great price!...
customer_reviews.author: E Holly lll

customer_reviews.title: protector
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. My relentless son was able to peel off the ones of the corner of our bed-frame though, but the ones on the stairs are still standing. Nothing can withstand a determined toddler though, so all in all great product that protected our little one many times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Don't get these.
customer_reviews.text: These corner protectors just don't do it. I followed all the instructions and only a couple hours after applying them to my new living room tables they were already coming off. They do not stick very well at all or stay on much less. This is without little ones touching them too. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Korrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My home is full of furniture with pointy edges. My children love to run around the house, they are toddlers so of course they are clumsy. This product puts my mind at ease. Been using these for over a year and have not had to replace one yet. Great product and value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Safety is the key!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended and is very easy to install! Had more in the box then I thought which was a plus! If you have a little one who’s all over the place and has more energy then you can handle, these are a great way to take safety precautions around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D

customer_reviews.title: Fair product good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a fair product. Has soft edges and looks good. Initially when i received this product the glue of the item did not last long. I left a review and i received and immediate response back from the manufacturer and i got a quick replacement. I appreciate the customer care. The product is good. Only call out is make a stronger glue so your little ones may not able to pull it back .
customer_reviews.author: shariff ansari

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They have saved my toddler from some probable serious injuries, particularly as he was learning to walk and maneuvering around furniture. One negative, however is they can easily be taken off when my son tries to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor shape design and inadequate material. Not useless, but not the protection you’d expect.
customer_reviews.text: 1) Material: the clear rubber these corner guards are made of is much too hard for its intended purpose, which is shock absorption. 2) Shape: unnecessarily big and bulky round, while leaving the corner edge virtually exposed. The bottom edge stays unprotected.
customer_reviews.author: Felix and Diana

product_meta.title: Skyla Homes - Clear Edge Bumpers for Baby Safety from Table Corners (20-Pack), Best High Resistant Furniture Corner Bumper, Child Proof Rubber Cabinet Cushion Cover, Plastic Covers Protector Guards
feature_bullets: SLEEP WITH PEACE OF MIND: Join millions of parents and trust Skyla helping create the safe, fun and warm home that you and your family deserve

WHY PARENTS TRUST US: Skyla products are factory tested (US Consumer Product Safety Commission); non-certified sellers sell adhesive apart from the bumper, putting your child's safety at incredible risk. As a small family business ourselves, we take a safe and happy home seriously. Your family is an extension of ours

CLEAR, TRANSPARENT, AND CLEAN: Skyla clear corner protector seamlessly blends with the glass and metal and, of course, the wooden furniture; be careful with glossy surfaces though, and it is highly recommended to clean the surface and leave it after sticking for at least 24h
WHAT YOU GET: A 20-pack of high grade pre-applied corner guards and great customer service; these premium edge guards have three times more hold and cushion than what's in the market.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Trusting Skyla never costs you a thing. If you are not 100% satisfied, simply write in to us, we even let you keep the product. Yes, that's how much we stand by our product. Try us now.

specifications.Safety warning: Product doesn't replace adults supervision. Adult supervision is strongly advised at all times while products are being used. Do not leave any product or its packaging with an unsupervised child.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars1,884 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
